rules_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Augmented[/i] – If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, put four +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control.
flavor_text:
[i]“What was this plane before the Wonderlands?”
—Fieldbook of Manuela Martinez[/i]
